  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120721</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120721</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Ravni valovi in enačba valovanja za E</string>
            <string language="en">Plane Waves and the Electric Field Equation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flache Wellen und die elektrischen 
Fangen Gleichung auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ondes planes et l'équation de champ électrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ondas planas e a equação do campo elétrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Onde piane e l'equazione del campo elettrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίπεδα κύματα και η εξίσωση ηλεκτρικών πεδίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ondas planas y la ecuación del campo eléctrico</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Vpliv valovne dolžine in amplitude na električno polje vzdolž ravnega EM valovanja.</string>
            <string language="en">Relation between wave length, amplitude and electric field of a linear EM wave.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">em valovanje</string>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektromagnetno valovanje</string>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Relation zwischen Welle Länge, Umfang und 
elektrischem fangen von einer linearen EM Welle auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La relation entre la longueur de vague, 
l'amplitude et le champ électrique d'une fin de support linéaire 
ondulent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A relação entre o comprimento de onda, a 
amplitude e o campo elétrico de um EM linear acena.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il rapporto fra la lunghezza di onda, l'ampiezza 
ed il campo elettrico di un EM lineare fluttua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέση μεταξύ του μήκους κυμάτων, του εύρους και του 
ηλεκτρικού πεδίου ενός γραμμικού κύματος EM.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La relación entre la longitud de onda, la 
amplitud y el campo eléctrico de un EM linear agita.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektromagnetische Wellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektromagnetische Strahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ondes électromagnétiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rayonnement électromagnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ondas eletromagnéticas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">radiação eletromagnética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">onde elettromagnetiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">radiazione elettromagnetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρομαγνητικά κύματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρομαγνητική ακτινοβολία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ondas electromagnéticas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">radiación electromágnetica</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
